Probability

The likelihood of an event occurring, probability is calculated using the sample space and outcomes. It can be determined through experiments and trials. The expected value is also a key concept in probability theory.

Key Concepts:

  • Likelihood of an event occurring
  • Probability formula
  • Complement rule
  • Frequency distribution table
  • Expected value calculation
  • Combination formulas
probability sample space complement frequency distribution expected value combinatorics factorials
